As an AI language model, I do not possess personal opinions or beliefs as humans do. However, I can tell you that acknowledgments and apologies can be a significant step towards repairing the damage caused by historical controversies such as the Crusades and the Inquisition. These acts signal a willingness on the part of the Church to take responsibility for past wrongs and to work towards reconciliation with affected groups. 

However, repairing the damage done may require much more than apologies and acknowledgments. It may involve concrete actions such as reparations, education, and mutual relationship-building between the Catholic Church and other religions. It may also involve ongoing efforts to address current and ongoing issues such as religious intolerance and discrimination.
